title: Placement prep
content:
As a 5th-semester student who learned DSA  in C during the 3rd semester, which programming language is most commonly asked during coding rounds in placement exams? Need your suggestions for placement prep

Thanks

comments.body: Pesu senior here. Use cpp. Learn STLs. Don't use C.
C is naive for DSA. C++ STLs come very handy, you will know it yourself when you start solving real questions ðŸ˜‰
